title: Value divided by 1000 (1 istead of 1000) is shown in Home for last messages for /send and / request command  if value is greater than 100
body: ### Description *Type*: Bug *Summary*: if last messages in chat are /send or /request command with value > 100 - it shows wrong value (divided by 1000). For example if last message is `/request 10000 STT`, in Home you can see 10 STT. #### Expected behavior the correct value is shown (`/request 10000 STT`) #### Actual behavior ### Reproduction - Open status - Log in - Send or request any amount of tokens or ETH, which is larger 100. ### Additional Information * Status version: release build 24 for 0.9.30 * Operating System: iOS 11.4
Also can be reproduced on desktop
Still happens. Sounds like a good simple bounty to me.
@StatusSceptre any news on approval of this bounty?

Issue Status: 1. **Open** 2. Started 3. Submitted 4. Done
__This issue now has a funding of 35.0 DAI (35.0 USD @ $1.0/DAI) attached to it.__ * If you would like to work on this issue you can 'start work' [on the Gitcoin Issue Details page](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/6517/2856). * Want to chip in? Add your own contribution [here](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/6517/2856). * Questions? Checkout Gitcoin Help or the Gitcoin Slack * $105,729.56 more funded OSS Work available on the [Gitcoin Issue Explorer](https://gitcoin.co/explorer)
